Player History
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 7/15/1985 with a Bruised Jaw, out for one week...
Injured on 5/8/1986 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 8/5/1986 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/26/1987 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/15/1988, off Joel Davis (LAD)...
Traded from Atlanta to Detroit on 4/26/1989 (Going to ATL: C Matt Nokes, 1B Will Clark. Going to DET: P Tom Glavine, P Chris Hammond, C Jerry Willard, LF Glenn Wilson, 1B Larry Sheets)...
Injured on 5/10/1989 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/12/1989...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Texas on 6/2/1990, striking out 6...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,385,714 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young Award in 1991, going 21-5, 2.48 ERA...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,421,429 through salary arbitration...
